text: :sos: Is it possible to add on my registration-site (<https://hub.scaling-champions.com/_hcms/mem/register?redirect_url=https%3A%2F%2Fhub.scaling-champions.com%2Fskalierungssystem-paper>) of a private content page extra labels in the form, besides mail + password? I also need the infromations: “name” + “company name” + “phone number”, if someone wants access to the private-content page?
